parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> ofp

</value></part><part><name>version1 </name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns absolute (positive) value of a real number.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[Number]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''abs''' n

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> n: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_n = [[abs]] -3; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Returns 3</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[+]] [[-]]
</value></part></template>
